long_description: The snowboard-friendly, palm-size Burton Bullet tune-up tool stores easily in your pack or pocket for on-the-slope repairs. Includes #2 and #3 Phillips screwdriver as well as a flathead, 4mm Allen key and a 10mm wrench. Fold-out handle provides maximum ratchet power. Secret compartment hides magnetized wrenches and bits.
short_description: The snowboard-friendly, palm-size Burton Bullet tune-up tool stores easily in your pack or pocket for on-the-slope repairs.
